Articles.Content:
A colleague and I have a classroom set of Kerbal Edu.  We are both new to KSP and have spent the last few weeks learning and crashing.  

Advice, cautionary tales and all that are appreciated.  We are working with high school students.

Hello Kurega Gikur, and welcome to the forum!

There is a significant learning curve in the game, but you already know that. 

The forum is full of advice on how to solve specific problems, and the Gameplay Questions section is where to go to ask a question if you can't find an answer already existing somewhere.

I envy you the opportunity to use KSP as a teaching tool.

Happy landings!
